sentences.en: An attorney and a paralegal in this office read every draft of every opinion in all cases prior to their release.
sentences.cn: 所有案例的每一项法律意见的每一草稿在公布前都要经我们办公室的一位律师和一位法律助理审读。

sentences.en: Don't rely on your secretary or paralegal advise you of important deadlines.
sentences.cn: 对那些重要日程,不要依赖秘书或助手的提醒.

sentences.en: Let your secretary or paralegal read it.
sentences.cn: 让你的秘书或者助手阅读你草拟的合同.

sentences.en: Unable to find a job as a teacher's aide, she decided to enroll in paralegal classes at night.
sentences.cn: 但是由于不能找到一份助理教师的工作，她决定报名参加一个夜校的律师助理课程。

trans.tran_cn: 律师的专职助手，律师帮办
